div.p:
The xx day of nouember' the yer' et cetera lxxvj / anent the clame made before the
aldirman and balyeis be Androw stil of the tak of the twa hals part of the toune of presly
and of certane corn and cattel apon Johne gregory askand the said Johne to
fulfil certane contractis and condicionis made betuix thaim tharupon / the said John askit
ane laghful dai til mak answer' / And the aldirman assignit til him tusda
next tocum / and to the said Androw tobring his witnes' of the saidis contractis the sam dai

Item the same dai henry voket sone and ayr of vmquhile William voket
burges of Aberdene is straitly bundin and oblist for him his ayris and his
assignais that quhat tyme it sal happin the annuel of auchtene schil
lingis of the land of vmquhile the ayris of Sandris grayis liand
abone the brade guttar in the galougate of Aberdene tobe redemyt
oute of the handis of the said henry his ayris or assignais / than incontinent
the said henry his ayris executouris or assignais ressauouris of that sowme
sal pay refound and content til gilbert skeyn of that ilk his ayris
executouris or assignais / the sowme of ten pundis of vsual money of scot
land / the quhilk sowme the said gilbert has payit and content to
the forsaid henry for ane Annuale rent of ten schillingis of the
said annual of xviij s' / the quhilk annuel of x s' the said henry
has resignit be a peny of siluer in the handis of Alexander rede ane
of the balyes of this burgh sittand in Jugement be virtu of the condicio
nis made betuix the saidis gilbert and henry before thir witnes'
Androw scherar' aldirman alexander meignes Alexander of chavmer Johne of Knollis
Dauid colisone Dauid menyes Johne Wormot thomas of chavmer thre
of the balyes Robert of Kyntor gilbert the vaus Johne the vaus'
William of Kyntor and ser Robert leis notar' with vthiris mony

Eodem die Alexander chavmer de murchil deuenit plegius legalis pro Dauid
crukschank quod thomas symson erit indempnis aliter quam Jura volunt
Et eodemmodo Willelmus blindseil iunior plegius de indempnitate dicti Dauid pro eodem thoma

Item the sam day it was fundin be ane Inquisicion of the Aldirman and consel that henry voket
son and ayr of quhilum William voket was infekit with leper / for the quhilk
thai callit him before thaim and deliuerit him the glufis chargeand him that fra thyne
furth he convers' nocht with hail folkis et cetera And incontinent that beand done Wilyam
blindsel eldar as procuratour and curate til Sandy voket brothir and aperand ayr to the said
henry protestit that gif it hapnit the said henry tomak alienacion of ony landis or annuel
rentis quhilkis he has / the tyme of this write / that it suld turne the said Alexander to na
preiudice anent his rycht in tym cuming / quhilkis landis and annualis eftir folois videlicet a land in futy
Item a merk of annuel of quhilum gib belmanis land at the castelget hede Item xj s'
of annuel of vmquhile John Walkaris land at the brede guttar Item x s' of quhilum John
of mar sam to this land in the galogate and a barn with a croft at the tail vtew the port
of the galowgate on the westsyde
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxijo die nouembris Anno Domini et cetera lxxvjto

quo die
Johannes de catnes adiudicatur in amerciamento quia per concessionem propriam percussit Duncanum
club seruitorem suum / et emendabit eidem vt Jura volunt Similiter dictus Duncanus
posuit se in voluntate pro perturbacione dicti magistri suj in verbo / et tenetur emendare

Eodem die comparens coram preposito et ballivis protribunali sedentibus Elena de clat Relicta
Duncani de clat quondam burgensis huius ville fatebatur se assedasse et ad fir
mam dimisisse dimedium rethe de le Raik aque de Dee et piscariam eiusdem
Johannj Wormot vni ballivorum huius burgi pro termino vnius annj futuri

Item eodem die thomas symson plegius legalis pro Andrea branche de indempnitate
Dauid nory aliter quam Jura volunt Et alexander alanson deuenit plegius similiter
pro dicto Dauid quod andreas branche erit indempnis ut supra

the same dai anent the actione debatabil betuix Johne of Knollis on the
ta part and Johne Wormot on the tothir part / of the assedacion of ane half net of the
Raik apon the wattir of Dee / the assise tharapon chosin and sworne / has fundin and
deliuerit / that Elene the spous' of vmquhile Duncan of clat set and made
assedacion . of the half nettis fisching of the said wattir til Cristiane of
cadiou the spous' of quhilum Androw alansone til indure for al the tyme of
the said Elenis lyif condicionaly gif that the said cristian made til hir sik
payment tharfor as quhilum the said Androw alanson made and payt til hir
And gif the said Elene can preve sufficiently and with sufficient witnes'
this day viij dais / that scho falyeit til hir of the payment as said is / in hir
defaut the assise fyndis the said wattir vakand in the said Elenys hand and
at hir disposicion

Item anent the clame made be Dauy nory of vij s' tobe awand be mage
branche for the mail of a hous' of quhilum thom lorymaris set til hir be
the said Dauy / the assise fand and deliuerit that mage branche occupijt the
said hous' ane half yere and that the mail tharof is awand til Eby lorymar

Item anent the ministracion' of Justice eftir the tenour of the kingis lettres in the actione deba
tabil betuix Dauid crukschank on the ta part and thomas symson on the behalf of Jo
net fichet his spous' on the tothir part is delayt with consent of the saidis partijs
vnto this day viij dais
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxvj die novembris anno et cetera lxxvjto

The quhilk dai the assise has deliuerit that Johne gregory and
Androw stil sal stand and vndirly the ordinance and decrete of thir
foure persons vndirwritin videlicet gilbert leche Adam androson Johne
Watson of govil and thom Watson anent the clamis and debatis
clamit be the said Androw apon the forsaid Johne concerning the
tak of the twa part of the toune of presly and certane gudis be
langing the same tak / of the quhilk tak the assise fyndis clere in
the self til androw stil and the price made tharof And that thai sal vndirly the forsaid
four' persons anent the price of the gudis

Item the same dai Robert cowpar is conuict be ane assise in vj s'
to alexander chamer seriand for a hous' mail the quhilk canny bar
ry tuke fra the said Alexander with consent of the said Robert et cetera

The penult dai of novembre yer' et cetera lxxvj in the actione and caus' movit betuix
Johne of Knollis and the spous' of quhilum Androw alanson on the ta part
and Johne Wormot and Elene of clat on the tothir part / anent the asse
dacione of ane half nettis fisching of the Raik apon the wattir of
Dee / the Assise has fundin and deliuerit that for ony pruyf or
witnes' that is producit and led before thaim / that the said quhilum
Androw alansonis wyif has verra rycht to the assedacion of the said
half net indurand al the dais of the said Elenys lyif be
virtu of the assedacion made til hir before witnes' be the
said Elene / And that scho make compt and rekning to the said
Elene of the malis bygane / and gude payment of the malys
for tocum et cetera

Item the same dai Alexander of chamer and Dauid colison beand sworn deponit and
deliuerit that William blindsel yungar becom ful dettour til meg the
spous' of quhilum thom alanson for thom blindsel / for ane hambre barel
of salmond restand vnpait to the said meg / of the half net of the
fuyrdis / and tobe pait within lachful tyme the balyes has chargit et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio die secunda Decembris anno et cetera lxxvjto

quo die
Robertus cowpar dedit Dauid howison plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate
Alexandri chavmer seriandi aliter quam Jura volunt Et Willelmus blindseil iunior
plegius similiter pro dicto alexandro

Johannes Watson de goil plegius legalis pro Alexandro clerk commorante in fyntra
Et Robertus culan plegius pro Andrea betty / quod quelibet pars erit indempnis
alterius aliter quam per viam Juris

Duncanus tailyour adiudicatur in amerciamento quia pro concessionem propriam iniuste perturbauit
Nicolaum masone et emendabit dampnum ad visum proborum Similiter dictus
nicholaus convictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbio dicti Duncanj et emendabit ut supra
Et Willelmus blindseil iunior deuenit plegius legalis pro Duncano talyour de
indempnitate dicti nicholai aliter quam Jura volunt Et eodemmodo Robertus de Kyntor
plegius pro nicholao mason

Eodem die Johannes fichet iunior dedit gilbertum vaus' plegium legalem pro eo
de indempnitate thome badenagh aliter quam Jura volunt Similiter Robertus de
Kyntor plegius pro dicto thoma quod prefatus Johannes erit indempnis

Johannes fichet iunior et thomas badenach ipsorum quilibet amerciatur pro perturbacione adinuicem vt
compertum fuit per assisam vnde predicti sui plegij premuniuntur per balliuos
ad intrandum eosdem crastina die pro emenda fienda et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio ixo die Decembris Anno Domini et cetera lxxvjto

quo die patricius tayn piscator adiudicabatur in amerciamento pro iniusta percussio
ne et graui lesione Johannis andree famuli domini de coliston' prout delibera
tum fuit per assisam Et eodemmodo dictus Johannes amerciatur pro perturbacione prefati patricij et cetera

Item eodem die Nicholaus mason amerciatur pro iniusta detencione trium lapidum a Duncano
talyour videlicet twa patis and a crist et cetera

Eodem die patricius rede de coliston' adiudicatur in amerciamento pro contemptu facto
Duncano stralogh vni seriandorum burgi in ministracione sui officij et cetera

the same dai the ballies in Jugement has chargit philp of Dunbrek seriand
to pas' til John gregory and warn him before witnes tocomper' in the tolbuthe be
fore thaim this dai viij dais to stand at the ordinance of the four' persons anent the
price making of the gudis betuix him and Androw stil as is contenit in the act of the
deliuerence of the assise maid tharupon Notwithstanding that he was warnit til haf
comperit this dai / and com nocht / And the said androw stil tuke witnes of the court tharapon
and that he wes redy todo that pertenit til him et cetera

Item the sam dai Robert blindseil on the behalf of Johne Wrycht of the Drum
and his wif clamit Donald listar of the wrangwis' halding of
a Ring of siluer with a stane / the quhilk Ryng the said Donald grantit
and todeliuer it or the vail tharof eftir the deposicion of the said Johne Wrycht
and his wyif quhat thai deponit that it was wourth / thai
payand til him samekil as thai ar awand til him for the litting of
thre eln' of clath or tharby as is writin in the said Donaldis buke et cetera

Curia legalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xvjto
die Decembris anno et cetera lxxvj / quo die secta vocata et curia affirmata et cetera

Eodem die Dauid crukeschank primo die vocatus ad sectam thome symson et
Jonete fichet sponse sue responsurus plegio in manibus philippi de Dunbrek
super eundem porrecto pro iniusta detencione quatuor dimediorum sive le demyis
auri / xij s' argenti et duarum petrarum lane ab eisdem / non comparuit / Ideo
precipitur sergeando capere districtum et cetera et premunire ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam
secundum diem processus

Item eodem die Johannes Wode pater burgensis huius burgi inuenit Duncanum sanquhar de murcroft
plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate Johannis Wode filij sui aliter quam Jura volunt

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxo die mensis Decembris predicti subscripti
electi fuerunt et Jurati in assisam videlicet Johannes Wode thomas de fyif Duncanus
sanchar de murcroft Johannes vaus' gilbertus chavmer Jacobus cummyng Willelmus
de Kyntor Willelmus blindsel senior Adam androson Alexander naghty thomas
symson et Johannes Duncanson / quhilkis deliuerit that the borgh strekit be
Alexander rede forspekar' til Willy mathoson the secund son of quhilum
Johne mathoson burges of Aberdene apon Wilyam quelp / for the wrang
wis' halding of foure merkis and a half merk fra the said Willy for the
mail of a chavmer pertening til him . of iiijor yeris and demi at martymes last
bypast / is of vail And that Wilyam quelp aw topay the said sowme
to the forsaid Willy mathoson within laghful terme / the quhilk mail Dauid
mathoson as tutour to the said Willy mathoson clamit in like wyis' on the be
half of the said childe

Thomas gardnar et Willelmus fet pistores conuicti per assisam ipsorum quilibet in
amerciamento pro perturbacione adinuicem / qui assisa ordinavit dictum Willelmum ad dandum
dimediam libre cere ad missam sancti Sanguinis et cetera

The xxiij dai of December yer' et cetera lxxvj before the Aldirman and balyes
sittand in Jugement Wilyam blindseil son and ayr til quhilum Alexander blind
sel burges of this ton' and executour til him in the name of executory fo
lowit James craik of the flemys siluer of the twa part of a pety
quartar of salt left be the said alexander in his testment tobe awand til
him / the quhilk the said James denyit / and swere the gret aith that
he had content and pait the said Alexander in his life / of al that he was
awand hym of the said pety quartar of salt
John stewart and cristinus prat conuicti per assisam quilibet amerciatur pro perturbio adinuicem et cetera

Curia ballivorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem die penultima Decembris
Anno et cetera lxxvjto

Quo die Joneta fichet filia et heres Willelmi fichet burgensis huius burgi
et sponse Thome symson constituit et sollemniter ordinavit ipsum thomam sponsum suum
thomam de fyif et Willelmum blindseil seniorem suos procuratores legittimos cum potestate
substituend' / ad prosequendum et defendendum terras tenementa crofta possessiones et alios
redditus quoscumque coram quibuscumque Judicibus legalibus infra pretorium dicti burgi aut extra
et penes quascumque alias causas placita aut debatas sibi qualitercumque incumben'
seu concernen' in latisima forma procuratorij / vna cum potestate prosequend' quascumque pe
cuniarum summas aut debita quicumque qui quidem procuratores coniunctim et divisim constituuntur et ordinantur
Et promisit de Rato et cetera
Thomas smyth famulus alanj amerciatur pro perturbio relicte thome ymlaw et prolium suarum

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio iiijto die Januarij anno predicto / Ranaldus glenny
amerciatur pro iniusta detencione x s' et viij d' a Johanne de toryleith prout compertum fuit
per assisam / et tenetur satisfacere seu satisfieri facere eidem infra terminum Juris

Curia capitalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis
eiusdem xiijo die Januarij Anno Domini et cetera lxxvjto / quo die secta vocata et curia
affirmata absentes patent in rotulo secte

div.head: Nomina assise
div.p:
Dauid symson alexander howison Willelmus blindsel iunior gilbertus de camera Dauid
mathoson alexander scrogis andreas murref senior Dauid de Kintor gilbertus
morison Johannes stewart Jacobus craik

Eodem die Dauid crukschank secundo die vocatus responsurus plegio super ipsum
porrecto per thomam symson et Jonetam fichet sponsam suam vt patet in pro
cessu primi diei / non comparuit / precipitur sergeando leuare districtum et cetera et
premunire ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem placiti

Item eodem die thomas symson primo die vocatus responsurus plegio per Andreas
goldsmyth super ipsum extenso in manibus Alexandri chavmer seriandi pro iniusta
detencione vnius barelle salmonum ab ipso andrea / non comparuit et cetera

Andreas lammynton conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione thome
quhite cordonarij

Eodem die deliberatum fuit per assisam quod Arne fansoym deliberabit
debitorem ad soluendum alexandro sanchar iuniori aut suis deputatis dimedietatem
barelle de le grils' existen' nunc apud le fer' aut valorem eiusdem si dicta
dimedietas barelle sit vendita infra hinc et le brugis merket sine vlteriori
dilacione Et ad hoc perimplendum Johannes vaus frater gilberti deuenit plegius
et debitor dicto alexandro

Item alexander sanchar iunior adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta extensione plegij super Arne
fansoym le sterman de iniusta detencione octo barellarum cepium le vnyonis
ab ipso alexandro / et dictus Arne quitus per assisam et cetera

The xvij day of Januar' the yer' et cetera lxxvj / it is deliuerit be ane assise
anent foure s' gret clamit be Dauid blabre on Johne of marbet
/ that gif James Douglas schipman at his hamecuming wil swere
that the said Johne of mar was feit man to the said Dauid / the said Johne
sal pay the said foure s' g' to the said Dauid / and failyeand tharof
the said Johne salbe quite of his clame of the said sowme

xviijo de mensis Januarij predicti / quidam Symon nauta adiudicabatur in amerciamento
pro iniusta detencione dimedie laste farine siliginis a Johanne vaus fratre gilberti
secundum empcionem et vendicionem alias inter ipsos fact'

The xx day of Januar' the yere forsaid / comperit before the Aldirman / Johne
Wormot and Alexander rede twa of the balyeis of this burgh sittand in Jugement
thir persons vndirwritin summonit be the officialis lettres tobere witnes and tode
pone anent the possession and debate of a land betuix thom club folowar
on the ta part and Androw mare defendour on the tothir part / the quhilkis persons
beand sworn in presence of the saidis partiis / Patrik badenagh forspekar
til the said Androw mare protestit / that quhat sumevyr thing / the forsadis
witnes deponit in the actione forsaid / suld nocht turn the said Androw til
na preiudice anent his fee and heritage of the said land in tym tocum

Dauid mathoson first witnes deponit and declarit be his aith that he
was present and saw thomas of chavmer than balye gif state and possession
til thom club of the land that Androw mair' duellis in

Wil more eldar secund witnes deponis that he remembris nocht gif that he
wes present or saw or for witnes tayn / quhen thomas of chavmer gef the
said possessione

Johne of myl thrid witnes deponit / that he saw nevir nor wyste thomas
of chavmer gif possession til thom club of the land forsaid et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxxiiijto die Januarij anno et cetera lxxvjto /

quo die
gilbertus morison adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie pro perturbacione eiusdem curie
ex confessione sua propria loquendo sine licencia petita et obtenta

Eodem die Edana sponsa hugonis mernagh et Elena commorans apud
clauem / quelibet amerciatur pro perturbacione adinuicem

Item eodem die gilbertus morison et Dauid fawconar ipsorum quilibet amerciatur per concessio
nes proprias pro arte et parte haben' de percussione et iniusta perturbacione marga
rete cryne

Item dicta margreta cryne conuicta per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro defamacione et
scandalo Walteri murison et cetera

Curia legalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxvijo die
Januarij anno predicto / quo die secta vocata et curie affirmata et cetera

Eodem die thomas de murray incola ville de leith amerciatur per concessionem propriam pro
iniusta perturbacione thome de schethyn

Item eodem die thomas symson secundo die vocatus ad sectam Andree goldsmyth ut patet
in rotulamento primi diei / non comparuit Et Ideo precipitur seriando capere districtum et cetera

the same dai before the aldirman and ballies in Jugement / thomas of murray sterman
of cornelus symonsonis schip grantit in presence of Wil robertson ane of the frachtis
men of the sam / that the said William consentit nocht but to the inputting of a pak
of lynt of the said thomas in the forsaid schip

Thomas litstar in li greyn primo die vocatus responsurus plegio per Johannem malisson in manibus
philippi de Dunbrek super eundem extenso pro iniusta detencione xxti s' ab eodem de resta
vnius pipe wadij / Non comparuit et cetera

Quo die Willelmus robertson calumpniatus fuit per Dauid colison de sexaginta
de le waynscot buyrdis / qui confessus est ad deliberandum sibi dictas mensas secundum
tenorem cedule sue vt de iure tenetur

Andreas colison conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione cuiusdam Willelmi
Wanthirmar'

Eodem die Dauid crukeschank tercio die vocatus ad sectam thome symson et Jone
te sponse sue responsurus vt patet in rotulamentis precedentibus / non comparuit

the same dai / before the Aldirman and consale / Dauid galichtlie is oblist and
has grantit tocontent and pay til Wat of aghneif the fadir or his procuratouris
xxxix s' penny but price at Witsunday next tocum withoute langar delay /

The penult day of Januar' yer' of god et cetera lxxvj Androw scherar' aldirman
Alexander chavmer of murchil alexander menyes Johne of mar' Johne of Knollis
thomas of fyif Dauid colison Robert blindsel and patrik badenagh certane
and maist part of the consale of Aberdene has grantit at the instance
of ane nobil and mychti lord George Erle of huntle lord gordon and
of badenaghe / that William the hay burges of the said burgh sal haue at
the next assedacione / ane take of wattir that he salbe plesit
of resoune and the bettir for my lordis saik

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio vltimo die Januarij / deliberatum fuit per
assisam quod thomas symson satisfaciet Jacobi craik de decem solidis gros
sorum et quatuor g' in grossis anglicanis infra terminum Juris
